dl.dd: Caribou/Munroes Island Provincial Park is located 11 km (7 mi.) north of the junctions of Routes 6, 106, and 376 on Nova Scotia's Northumberland Shore, 4 km (2.5 mi.) east of the Caribou / Wood Islands (PEI) ferry wharf.

h4.a: Click here for a park map

html.p: Offering a 95-site campground, picnic areas, and an unsupervised beach. There is a walking trail along the beach out to the island.
WiFi is available at the admin building only and the surrounding area. There will be a password needed, please see the park receptionists.
